instruction: Identify the common theme in the three given pieces of work.
input:
A: A poetry book called "The Garden Of Earthly Delights" 
B: A short story called "The Kite Runner"
C: A painting titled "The Garden of Earthly Delights"
output: The common theme in these three works is the Garden of Earthly Delights. The book and painting both have a title of the same name, and it is implied in the short story. The Garden of Earthly Delights is also known as an earthly paradise, so the theme could also be interpreted as a paradise or utopia.
